title: Available Now!! Quiet 1b1b Single cabin in Prescott West Oakland
posting_body: Quiet 1 bedroom 1 bathroom Single cabin in Prescott West Oakland
Due to the volume of inquiries, No phone calls please.
Please send email by click on "Request a tour" or "Check Availability" or "Email" with your credit score, desired move in date and email address, we will contact you to schedule an appointment.
Built in 2008, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom West Oakland.
Two separate buildings at corner lot, separated by shared fenced yard.
Close to AC Transit, West Oakland BART and 880 freeway.
- Full size bathrooms with shower over tub
- Shared fenced back yard for entertaining
- No laundry facticity in the building
- 12 min walk to West Oakland BART Station
- Blocks from Downtown Oakland and Chinatown
- Within 2-miles driving to Oakland's popular eateries, Jack London Square, Oakland Museum of California, Lakeside Park Garden Center and Lake Merritt
- Verified monthly gross household income 2.5X rent
- Tenant pays for water, electricity, gas, internet and cable TV
- Maximum 1 pet below 30 lbs, $500 pet deposit, $30 pet pet per rent
- Tenant required to carry renter's insurance policy ($500k liability)
- Deposit and 1st month rent due at lease signing
- Preference will be given to early move-in qualified tenants
Offered and managed by The Cal Agents Realty, DRE# 02020017
